name: Bowling Club: Realistic 3D PvP
description:
Bowling Champions aren’t born, they are made in the fire of competition.

“Bowling Club” opens up its gates! Step into virtual alleys and experience the thrill of live matchmaking, skillful ball rolling and competitive pin-smashing simulation like never before!

Best of Both Worlds
Beauty and skill? Yes, please! Now, that’s a game loaded with beautiful content: from superbly designed Arenas, to a slew of equipment, to the player avatars - the eye-catching elements will make you marvel. At the same time, the game is focused on the skill you will master with intuitively easy-to-use controls. No fuss, just fun!

High-end 3D graphics
Without question, Bowling Club is gorgeous with its balls rolling ablaze and the funny pin smashing animations. However, unlike competition, our game offers fully customizable 3D avatars! You’re getting a unique opportunity to express yourselves with customization: get your 3D avatar the coolest gear and stand out from the crowd!

Game On, Anytime
It’s perfect for passing the time while waiting or on-the-go. The multiplayer matches don’t take long and the enjoyment never drops in this fast-paced sport!

Real Multiplayer Madness
Our game is the real deal. Challenge players from across the globe in thrilling PvP matches, or gather your friends to form a club and dominate the lanes together! With real-time multiplayer action, this competitive simulation never stops.

Competitive Edge
There are multiple challenges you may set for yourself and your crew. Similarly to the real-life sport, there are leaderboards to climb for individual players and clubs. The ranked seasons and the battle pass are intertwined and go along with each other. You’ll never get tired as there’s always a prize to set your eyes on!

The Spice
The secret sauce to Bowling Club are Special Events and Skillshot. The former ones offer various game modes so that you never get bored and the latter one is exactly as the name advertises: rolling the ball so skillfully that you knock down the most pins possible. There are plenty of rewards just waiting to be won! And if that wasn’t enough, we’ve got the Lucky Wheel: a game of chance where you can get awesome prizes!

Quest for Growth
You will most certainly feel how satisfying it is to level up, unlock new bowling alleys, and conquer the leagues and divisions. You will unlock achievements and get rewards along the way. The healthy diet of daily missions and weekly challenges will keep you motivated. With the multiplayer bouts fought, your gear upgraded, and practice under your belt, the bowling king mastery is for the taking!

Join our Player Community on social media and share your accolades with fellow pin-smashing enthusiasts! Let the ball roll! Let’s strike up some fun together!
